officialTitle: Treatment of Eating Disorders With and Without Childhood Trauma: A Randomized Controlled Trial
inclusionCriteria:
* satisfying DSM-V criteria for ED and for half of the patients in addition
* have a history of childhood trauma.
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* current suicidal risk
* current psychosis
* ongoing trauma (e.g. current involvement in an abusive relationship).
